name: outs
description: Execute this command to set outputs state.

fields.name: output_port
fields.label: Output Port
fields.description: The unit hardware output number. Outputs are numbered 1 though 4

fields.name: output_control
fields.label: Output Control
fields.description: This parameter is to set the output state to 0 (off) or 1(on) of the defined output port in the “Output Port” parameter.

fields.name: toggle_duration
fields.label: Output Toggle Duration, 10 = 1 segundo
fields.description: To define the time interval of the specific output port staying in the specific state.

fields.name: toggle_times
fields.label: Output Toggle Times
fields.description: To define the times of the specific output port changing from current state to alternative state and back to the original state after reaching the duration.
